title: Iván Rodríguez
summary: Iván Rodríguez Torres (born November 27, 1971), nicknamed "Pudge"[1] and "I-Rod", is a Puerto Rican former Major League Baseball catcher. He played for the Texas Rangers (in two separate stints, comprising the majority of his career), Florida Marlins, Detroit Tigers, New York Yankees, Houston Astros and Washington Nationals. Rodríguez was awarded the AL MVP award in 1999  and is widely regarded as one of the greatest catchers in MLB history.
